definition: to soar/to wheel about in the sky
to soar/to glide/variant of 詳|详[xiang2]

sentences.english: Birds soar in the sky while fishes roam in the sea.
sentences.chinese: 鸟儿翱翔天空，鱼儿遨游大海。

sentences.english: The music of the far-away summer flutters around the Autumn seeking its former nest.
sentences.chinese: 远远往了的夏之音乐，翱翔于秋间，寻求它的旧垒。

sentences.english: Set the bird's wings with gold and it will never again soar in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 把黄金系在鸟翅上，鸟儿将永远不能翱翔于天际。

sentences.english: Under the morning sun, a great happiness hovers in space.
sentences.chinese: 在晨日的照耀下，一股巨大的欢喜之情在空中翱翔。

sentences.english: Fly high in a rainstorm like an eagle. Thresh about in a rough sea like a beach swimmer.
sentences.chinese: 像老鹰在风雨中翱翔，像弄潮儿在海浪中搏击。

sentences.english: Why can't I fly like a bird in the blue sky?
sentences.chinese: 我为什么不能像小鸟一样在蓝天上自由自在地翱翔呢？

sentences.english: Mr Cole's independent spirit seems to have taken flight in America.
sentences.chinese: 科勒的独立精神似乎在美国展翅翱翔了。

sentences.english: I learned to fly, I can hover in the sky of.
sentences.chinese: 我学会了飞翔，我能翱翔于天际了。

sentences.english: Joe, with his long sight, signalled several flocks of birds of grey hovering on the horizon.
sentences.chinese: 乔用他的敏锐的目力看到空中有成群的猛禽在翱翔。

sentences.english: Nearly bird island Millions egrets flying sky on the island north of the lake.
sentences.chinese: 近观鸟岛上万千白鹭翱翔天空，湖面上岛屿星罗棋布。

sentences.english: We now see is a group of white iron wings soaring in the blue sky.
sentences.chinese: 大家现在看到的就是一群铁翅白在蓝天中翱翔。

sentences.english: Earlier in the "World Xiang, " danced world.
I should soar trippingly like a butterfly.
sentences.chinese: 我应该去翱翔如蝶舞翩翩。

sentences.english: Wine Maniac's heroic spirit soars with shine.
sentences.chinese: 酒癖的英雄气概闪着光彩在翱翔。

sentences.english: Wine Maniac's heroism soars with flare.
sentences.chinese: 酒癖的英雄气概闪着光彩在翱翔。

sentences.english: Xu Bin, Flying Enthusiast, wanted to fly in the air.
sentences.chinese: 徐斌这位飞行爱好者，想要翱翔天际。

definition: to circle in the air/to soar
to spread one's wings and soar (idiom)/to develop one's abilities freely
to travel/to go on a tour/to roam
male eagle/tercel (male falcon used in falconry)
(bird species of China) northern goshawk (Accipiter gentilis)
lit. the giant Peng bird spreads its wings and begins to fly/displaying awesome power and momentum at the outset/to have the world at one's feet
the eagle soars in the sky (citation from Mao Zedong)
